        Generate paired-end next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) reads.
        Parameters:
        reference - reference, must not be null
        variant - FASTQ variant, must not be null
        random - random, must not be null
        length - length distribution, must not be null
        insertSize - insert size distribution, must not be null
        quality - quality strategy, must not be null
        coverage - coverage strategy, must not be null
        mutationRate - mutation rate, must be between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive
        mutation - mutation strategy, must not be null
        first - first appendable, must not be null
        second - second appendable, must not be null
        writer - FASTQ writer, must not be null
